Actions.Name: Weapon Vault
Actions.Description: The [name] targets a character in range 2, then removes itself from the battlefield and places itself in any space adjacent to that character. Then, it may shove that character 1.

Combo.Name: Whirlwind
Combo.Effects: The [name] rushes 1 space, three times. After it rushes, each time, it deals 2 damage to adjacent characters.
